Extraction Method: Cold Pressed


Historic Benefits: In 1823 the French brought them over from the West Indies to Florida. In just about 50 years time, Florida made its first shipment of grapefruits to the ports of New York and Philadelphia in 1885. This created a whirlwind of interest in the fruit, launching the beginnings of the commercial grapefruit industry as we know it. Grapefruit is a powerful antioxidant, disinfectant, and antidepressant. 


Blends Well With: Bergamot, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Citrus, Clove Bud, Cypress, Frankincense, Geranium, ginger, Lavender, Litsea Cubeba, Neroli, Nutmeg, Palmarosa, Patchouli, Peppermint, Sandalwood, Tangerine, Ylang Ylang

products.name: 15ml Conventional Tangerine
products.description:
Country of Origin: USA, Conventionally Grown

Botanical Name: Citrus reticulata

Plant Part: Peel

Note: Fresh, Citrus, Sweet, Fruity



Man Found Standing, Medicine Man Practitioner writes: Tangerine is one of the few essential oils that has a very limited supply of certified organic material. Because of this, the cost of the organic oil is many times more expensive than the conventionally grown. Any company saying they are selling Organic Tangerine is probably not telling the truth unless that oil is many times more expensive than the standard conventional pricing. This is one of the oils I like to look at when trying to determine if a company is telling the truth or selling low quality, adulterated essential oils. For greater details, see the picture printout from my book. Historically Tangerine has been used to assist in:

  • Nervous System: stress, anxiety
  • Digestive Aid: constipation, laxative, flatulence, intestinal spasms, detoxifier
  • Lungs: congestion, coughs, decongestant


Extraction Method: Cold Pressed


Historic Benefits: The oil from the peel was use as a general health tonic and to uplift and elevate the mind.


Blends Well With: Cedarwood, Chamomile, Citrus, Clary Sage, Frankincense, Geranium, Lavender, Rose, Sandalwood, Ylang Ylang


Precautions: Phototoxic and skin irritant to sensitive individuals.

products.name: 15ml Alignment
products.description:
List of Ingredients: Wild, Ethically Farmed, and Organic Essential Oils of Frankincense, Spruce, West Indies Sandalwood, Helichrysum, Peppermint, Black Pepper, Basil, Cypress, and Nutmeg in a base of fractionated coconut oil. 



Man Found Standing, Medicine Man Practitioner writes: Review the information on each single essential oil to understand more how powerful this synergistic combination can be. This formula is used to assist the alignment of the physical structure of the body, in overcoming fear so we can stand tall during adversity, and to bring the body's electrical energies back into harmony. 


Traditional Application: Apply three to four drops on the bottom of each foot each morning. Used on the wrists, massaged along the spine and the throat from neck to thymus, and to balance the brain by rubbing a drop on the temples. 


Companion Blends: Enhances the use of all other oils. Great with Deep Heat, Joint Support, Meditate, Pain Free


Precautions: No Special Cautions


Classification: Body Balance

products.name: 15ml Allergy Free
products.description:
List of Ingredients: Wild, Ethically Farmed and Organic Essential Oils of Lemongrass, Rosemary, Tea Tree, Lavender, Lemon, and Myrtle.



Man Found Standing, Medicine Man Practitioner writes: Review the information on each single essential oil to understand more how powerful this synergistic combination can be. This formula was especially formulated for diffusing to kill airborne anaerobic bacteria, viruses, mold, and fungus, by neutralizing mildew, cigarette smoke, and eliminating other noxious odors and their potential health problems. The aroma is very cleansing and topically it is beneficial in neutralizing poison from insect bites, spiders, scorpions, bees, hornets, and wasps. It repels bugs, and mice, and assists in treating wounds healing, cuts, nervous exhaustion, respiratory conditions, poor circulation, and regenerates connective tissue. 


Traditional Application: Apply to infected areas of the body. Diffuse to purify the air, stop the spread of sickness, and to neutralize paint fumes and other toxins. (Cycle the diffuser one hour on and two hours off.) Put fifty drops in a four-ounce spray bottle with water, shake, and spray around a hotel room - especially the mattress. To remove cigarette smoke from clothing, hang them in the bathroom and spray. Let the clothes hang overnight. 


Companion Blends: Breathe Free, Fit, Meditate, Thief Blend


Precautions: Hotter oil so use with caution and with a carrier oil when needed.


Classification: Air Purifier

products.name: 15ml Breathe Free
products.description:
List of Ingredients: Wild, Ethically Farmed and Organic Essential Oils of Eucalyptus radiata, Eucalpytus citriodora, Myrtle, Peppermint, Spruce, and Basil. 



Man Found Standing, Medicine Man Practitioner writes: Review the information on each single essential oil to understand more how powerful this synergistic combination can be. This formula was especially formulated to assist the respiratory system. It is beneficial for bronchitis, pneumonia, the flu, colds, fevers, asthma, laryngitis, coughs, sinusitis, sore throats, cold sores, and lung infections by loosening and expelling mucus and reducing inflammation. This formula has been known to assists in getting rid of bone spurs when applied topically on location.


Traditional Application: Massage topically over the lungs and throat areas. Apply a hot, wet towel compress for 15 minutes. For children, use one-half to one-third the amount and mix with a carrier oil. Diffusing has been a powerful treatment for viral TB, pneumonia, and other viral problems. Apply to the Vita Flex points on the feet.


Companion Blends: Allergy Free, Flu Relief, Meditate, Thief Blend, Tummy Soothe


Precautions: Avoid taking internally and application near infants because of the cooling effect on respiratory system.


Classification: Respiratory Support
